definition: to store up/to grow (e.g. a beard)/to entertain (ideas)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: While this is particularly true for primary cells, this technique can also be used for secondary cells.
sentences.chinese: 儘管對於原電池是這樣，該技術還可以用於蓄電池。

sentences.english: The technics of making thin lead-acid batteries plates by slurry method was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出採用拉漿工藝製備鉛酸蓄電池薄型極板。

sentences.english: This thesis mainly proposed the research on fast-charging method of lead-acid battery.
sentences.chinese: 本論文主要對鉛酸蓄電池的快速充電問題進行了研究。

sentences.english: Converter is the important part of the power accumulator battery testing system.
sentences.chinese: 變流器是動力蓄電池組測試系統重要組成部分。

sentences.english: The electrochemical performance of a kind of VRLA battery is presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對一種VRLA蓄電池的部分電性能進行了初步探討。

sentences.english: This kind of storage battery charges easily.
sentences.chinese: 這種蓄電池很容易充電。

sentences.english: This paper is summarized the importance of consistency of VRLA batteries.
sentences.chinese: 概要介紹了VRLA蓄電池組一致性的重要性。

sentences.english: The accumulator is empty in fifty five seconds.
sentences.chinese: 蓄電池在55秒之內會變空。

sentences.english: This thesis presents a novel zero-current-transition (ZCT) pulse-width-modulation(PWM) dc-dc converter for battery chargers.
sentences.chinese: 本論文提出一零電流轉移脈波寬度調變蓄電池充電器。

sentences.english: The weakened battery was no longer discharging.
There are no accumulators in this room, just current transducers.
sentences.chinese: 在這個房間裏沒有蓄電池，只有電流轉換器。

sentences.english: To select the over-sized cable section for the storage battery circuit would make it difficult to construct.
sentences.chinese: 如蓄電池迴路電纜截面選擇過大會造成施工困難。

sentences.english: Self discharge performance is one of the important properties of secondary cells.
sentences.chinese: 自放電性能是蓄電池的主要性能之一。

sentences.english: Given the technology’s promise, it may be time for batteries to stand guard.
sentences.chinese: 考慮到技術承諾，這也是到了蓄電池靠邊站的時候了。

sentences.english: The development foreground of the future Chinese lead-acid battery industry was viewed.
sentences.chinese: 展望了未來中國鉛蓄電池工業的發展前景。

sentences.english: This silicon solid electrolyte of lead accumulator includes two components, A and B, both of which have been clarified.
sentences.chinese: 一種鉛蓄電池硅固電解質及其製造方法。
